g.text: System Sequence Diagram - US 3.1.5: SPA Forms and Pages with CRUD Operations (Frontend Only)
Scenario 1: List View with Filtering and Searching
Display resource list with filter/search options
Applies filter/search criteria\n(e.g., by name, status, category)
Filter resources array locally by criteria
Scenario 2: Create New Resource with Form Validation

Validate required fields:
requiredField1 != null
requiredField2 != empty
format validation
displayMessage("Please fill in all required fields")
Maps form data to CreateResourceDto\nwith all required and optional fields
Display success message and refreshed list
Selects resource from list and clicks "Edit"

Populate form with resource data:
form.id = resource.id
form.field1 = resource.field1
form.field2 = resource.field2
etc.
displayMessage("Please fill in all required fields")
Display success message and refreshed list
Selects resource and clicks action button\n(e.g., "Activate", "Deactivate", "Submit")
Validate pre-conditions\n(e.g., current status allows action)
displayMessage("Action not allowed in current state")
Display success message and refreshed list
